pkgmetadata.longdescription: pymorphy2-dicts-ru==========================================================Russian dictionaries for `pymorphy2`_... _pymorphy2: https://github.com/kmike/pymorphy2Installation------------Install:: $ pip install pymorphy2-dicts-ruUsage-----To use these dictionaries with pymorphy2 create MorphAnalyzerwith ``lang='ru'`` parameter:>>> import pymorphy2>>> morph = pymorphy2.MorphAnalyzer(lang='ru')To get a path to the installed dictionary data use``pymorphy2_dicts_ru.get_path()`` method.Development-----------The main repo is https://github.com/kmike/pymorphy2-dicts/. The repositorydoesn't contain the data itself: only package template and updatescripts are stored in VCS.License for Python code in this package is MIT.The data is licensed under`Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike <http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/>`_.
